column2: "Ɔhen Nebukadenezar dze kɛma aman
column3: amanaman
column4: na kasa horow a wɔtse asaase do nyina dɛ; ma onsi hom yie mbordo."

column2: "Nsɛnkyerɛdze na anwanwadze a Ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn ayɛ ama me no
column3: mohwɛ a
column4: oye dɛ mebɛka akyerɛ hom."

column2: "Mbrɛ ne nsɛnkyerɛdze no dua yɛ akɛse a! Na mbrɛ n’anwanwadze no dua yɛ dzen a! N’ahendzi yɛ daa ahendzi
column3: na no tumdzi fi mbasantsen kesi mbasantsen do."

column2: "Emi Nebukadenezar metse dwudwoodwo wɔ me fie
column3: na mo ho tɔɔ me wɔ m’aban mu."

column2: "Minyaa adaaso bi a ɔmaa mo bo tui; na me mpa do adwendwen na m’enyido adzehu haaw me."
"Dɛm ntsi mehyɛɛ mbra dɛ wɔmfa Babilɔn enyansafo nyina mbra m’enyim
column3: ma wɔmbɛkyerɛ me adaaso no ase."

column2: "Nna nkongyaayifo
column3: nkaberkyerfo
column4: Kaldeafo
column5: na sebramufo bae: na mekaa adaaso no wɔ hɔn enyim; naaso wɔamma mennhu ne nkyerɛase."

column2: "Na n’ekyir no
column3: Daniel a ne dzin nye Bɛltesasar
column4: dɛ mbrɛ mo bosom ne dzin tse no
column5: na abosom krɔnkrɔn nyina hɔn sunsum wɔ no mu no
column6: baa m’enyim: na mekaa adaaso no wɔ n’enyim
column11: osiandɛ minyim dɛ abosom krɔnkrɔn no hɔn sunsum wɔ wo mu
column12: na esumasɛm biara nnhaw wo ntsi
column13: ka m’adaaso a muhunii wɔ enyido adzehu mu no na ne nkyerɛase no kyerɛ me."

column2: "Mbrɛ m’enyido adzehu wɔ me mpa do tse no nye yi: Muhun dɛ dua bi si asaase finimfin a ɔyɛ tsentsenntsen."
"Dua no nyinii
column3: na ɔyɛɛ dzen
column4: na ne tsentsen kodur sor
column5: na wohunii wɔ asaase do beebiara."

column2: "Na n’ahaban yɛ fɛw
column3: na no nsowee pii
column4: na edziban wɔ mu ma nyimpa nyina: hambowa gyee nwin wɔ ase
column5: na wimu ntumbowa sisii n’abaw do

column2: "Muhunii wɔ m’enyido adzehu mu wɔ me mpa do no mu dɛ
column3: ɔweɔmfo krɔnkrɔnnyi bi fi sor dwirii."

column2: "Ɔtseaa mu dzendzen see dɛ
column3: Hom ntow dua no nto famu
column4: na hom ntwitwa n’abaw no
column5: hom mpo n’ahaban ngu
column6: na hom mbɔ no nsowee mpetse: wɔmma mbowa nguan mfi ase
column7: na ntumbowa mfi m’abaw no do."

column2: "Naaso hom ngya no ndwow dusin wɔ asaase mu
column3: wɔ dadze na boran mpokyerɛ mu
column4: wɔ hamu nkyɛkyɛr momon mu; na ɔsor bɔsu mfɔw no
column5: na ɔnye mbowa nwe asaase do efuw:"

column2: "n’adwen nsakyer ngyaa nyimpa dze yɛ
column3: na wɔmma no mbowa adwen; na mfe esuon ntwa ne tsir do."

column2: "Aweɔmfo krɔnkrɔn no do na atsɛn yi nam
column3: na akrɔnkrɔmfo asɛm do na adze yi sii: ama atseasefo eehu dɛ Ɔsorsornyi no dzi nyimpa ahendzi do tum
column4: na ɔdze ma obiara a ɔpɛ
column5: na ɔdze nyimpa mu ɔhobrɛadzenyi biara si do."

column2: "Adaaso yi na emi ɔhen Nebukadenezar mehu: na ɔwo
column3: Bɛltesasar
column4: ka nkyerɛase no kyerɛ me
column5: osiandɛ enyansafo a wɔwɔ m’ahendzi mu nyinara enntum amma mennhu nkyerɛase no; na ɔwo dze
column7: osiandɛ abosom krɔnkrɔn sunsum wɔ wo mu."

column2: "Nna Daniel a ne dzin dze Bɛltesasar no no ho boow no kakra ara sann
column3: na n’adwen haaw no. Ɔhen no see no dɛ
column4: Bɛltesasar
column5: mma daa no
column6: anaa ne nkyerɛase no nnhaw wo. Bɛltesasar buae see dɛ
column8: nkyɛ adaaso no mfa hɔn a wokyir wo ho
column9: na ne nkyerɛase mfa w’ahohiahiafo ho."

column2: "Dua no a ihunii a onyinii na ɔyɛɛ dzen a ne tsentsen kɛpeem sor
column3: na wohun no wɔ wiadze nyina;"

column3: na no nsowee pii
column4: na edziban wɔ mu ma nyimpa nyina; na hambowa tsetse ase
column5: na wimu nnoma sisi n’abaw do no"

column4: na ayɛ dzen: osiandɛ wo kɛseyɛ enyin
column5: na ekodu sor
column6: na wo tumdzi ekodu asaase ewiei."

column2: "Na susuampa dɛ ɔhen hun ɔweɔmfo krɔnkrɔnnyi bi dɛ ofi sor dwirii bɛsee dɛ
column3: Hom ntow dua no nto famu
column4: na hom nsɛɛ no; naaso hom ngyaa no ndwow dusin wɔ asaase mu
column5: wɔ dadze na boran mpokyerɛ mu
column6: wɔ hamu nkyɛkyɛr momon mu; na ɔsor bɔsu mfɔw no
column7: na ɔnye hambowa ndzidzi nkodu dɛ mfe esuon botwa ne tsir do no;"

column2: "ɔhen
column3: nkyerɛase no nye yi
column4: na ɔyɛ Ɔsorsornyi no ne ntsea a ɔaba mo wura ɔhen do."

column2: "Wɔbɛpam wo efi nyimpa mu
column3: na enye hambowa atsena
column4: na wɔama awe efuw dɛ anantwi
column5: na ɔsor bɔsu afɔw wo
column6: na mfe esuon etwa wo tsir do; ekodu dɛ ibohu dɛ Ɔsorsornyi no dzi tum wɔ nyimpa ahendzi do
column7: na ɔdze ma obiara a ɔpɛ."

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ wɔhyɛɛ dɛ wongyaa dua no ndwow dusin no; sɛ inya hu dɛ Ɔsorsor dzi tum a
column3: w’ahendzi begyina ama wo."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: ɔhen
column4: ma m’afotu nsɔ w’enyi
column5: na fa
column7: na fa abɔbɔfo do mbɔbɔrhu pepa w’emumuyɛ; dɛ bi a wɔbɛma w’eyiedzi awar a."

column2: "Iyi nyina baa ɔhen Nebukadenezar do."
"Abosoom duebien ekyir no
column3: dabi nna ɔhen no nenam Babilɔn ahemfi no etsifi
column5: "na ɔkasae see dɛ
column6: Ana nnyɛ Babilɔn kɛse a menam m’ahoɔdzen tum na mo tumdzi enyimnyam do makyekyer ayɛ m’ahendzi tsenabea no nye yi bi?"

column2: "Ɔhen no n’ano da asɛm no do ara
column3: nna ndze bi fi sor baa dɛ
column4: Ɔhen Nebukadenezar ei
column5: ɔwo na wɔreka kyerɛ wo
column6: dɛ: ahendzi no efi wo nsamu kɔ."

column2: "Na wɔbɛpam wo efi nyimpa mu
column3: na enye hambowa akɛtsena; wɔbɛma awe efuw dɛ anantwi
column4: na mfe esuon etwa wo tsir do; ekodu dɛ ibohu dɛ Ɔsorsornyi no dzi tum wɔ nyimpa ahendzi do
column5: na ɔdze ma obiara a ɔpɛ."

column2: "Dɔn no mu ara na asɛm no baa mu wɔ Nebukadenezar do: na wɔpaam no fii nyimpa mu
column3: na ɔwee efuw dɛ anantwi
column4: na ɔsor bɔsu fɔɔw no honam
column5: dze kodur dɛ ne tsinhwi fuuw dɛ ɔkɔr ntɛkyerɛ
column6: na n’awerɛw yɛɛ dɛ nnoma dze."

column2: "Na nda no n’ewiei no
column3: emi Nebukadenezar memaa m’enyi do hwɛɛ ɔsor
column4: na me ntseasee sanee baa mo hɔ
column5: na mihyiraa Ɔsorsornyi no
column6: na miyii nyia ɔtse ase daa no ayɛw
column7: mekamfoo no; dɛ no tumdzi yɛ daa tumdzi
column8: na n’ahendzi fi mbasantsen kesi mbasantsen:"

column2: "na asaase do atsefo nyina wommbu hɔn hwee: na ɔyɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔpɛ wɔ ɔsor dɔm mu
column3: na asaase do atsefo mu: na obi nnyi hɔ a obotum esianka ne nsa
column4: anaa oebisa no dɛ
column5: Ebɛnadze na ereyɛ yi?"

column2: "Aber no ara na me ntseasee sanee baa mo hɔ; na m’ahendzi enyimnyam ntsi mo tumdzi na me hyerɛn sanee baa mo hɔ; na m’apamfo na m’ebirɛmpɔn bɔhwehwɛɛ me; na wotsintsiim me wɔ m’ahendzi mu
column3: na wɔdze akɛseyɛ a ɔkyɛn kaa mo ho."
